text:
@realDonaldTrump COVID-19 is a virus
- it cant read his tweets
- it can't be bullied
- he can't sue it
- it doesn't care how much $ he has
- it could care less about his ratings
- it doesn't care about political party affiliation 
- it doesn't respect borders or walls

We are #1, in deaths😪
